questions.question: Is the house presented as a standalone collectible game asset, positioned as if part of a board game scene?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the house is positioned on a game-like board with a parchment-style board containing text and miniature figures around it, indicating it is part of a board game scene. This arrangement resembles a typical board game setup where models and other game-related items are placed together.

questions.question: Have the colors of the house been changed to earthy tones such as browns, tans, and muted greens instead of bright reds and yellows?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the colors of the house include browns and tans in the structure and a muted green base, contrasting the bright red roofs and yellow highlights in Image A. This suggests a shift to an earthy color palette.

questions.question: Is there visible moss texture applied to the base of the house, particularly along the foundation or lower walls?
questions.explanation: Image B shows a base with a green hue, which may suggest the presence of moss or grass, fitting the typical portrayal of organic textures like moss in such fantasy game scenes.

questions.question: Have all stone textures (such as pillars and wall sections) been replaced with wooden plank textures showing visible grain and joints?
questions.explanation: In Image B, the previous stone textures in Image A have been replaced with wooden planks, displaying visible wood grain and joints, indicating a material change from stone to wood.

questions.question: Are there at least one or more miniature fantasy characters (e.g., knight, wizard, dwarf) placed beside the house?
questions.explanation: Image B includes miniature figures placed around the house, resembling typical fantasy characters often seen in board games, which are absent in Image A.

questions.question: Is the text “Castle Quest” displayed on a parchment-style board located beneath the house?
questions.explanation: In Image B, there is a visible parchment-style board with the text “Castle Quest” written on it, which is positioned in front of the house, unlike in Image A where such elements are absent.

questions.question: Are there one or more detailed rule booklets (small folded papers with visible text or illustrations) positioned beside the house?
questions.explanation: Image B features rule booklets with legible text placed beside the house, suggesting additional game components, while Image A does not include these detailed rule booklets.
